FuncDef: This command associated the I-VPLS with the B-VPLS service. The ISID value is used to mux/demux packets for the VPLS flowing through the B-VPLS.

ParaDef.Info: This value represents the VPLS ID value associated with the B-VPLS.
Defines ISID associated with the I-VPLS. Values-0 to 16777215. ParamDefault: Default- The default is the service-id.
